page.title: 16Tickhill Corn Mill A
page.content: This building recently worked but is now boarded up and derelict.The{miller who used to work the mill came to talk to us.He told us how the mill was worked by his Grandfather before him. The mill was always used by the{ {farmers}from villages around Tickhill eg.Rossington,Wadworth,Harworth and Stainton.Often the corn was left outside the mill by the stone steps. Eventually corn was only made into meal this{fed the animals}in winter and summer.Forty years ago the water wheels were replaced by{electricity}as the water in the mill pond silted up and could not give enough power.Up to 1983 the mill was used.Then the miller {retired}the owner,Lord Scarbrough decided to{sell}this property.Many channels had to be looked into as planning is special.
